ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Interviews the Liberation Queen; The Cracked Guide to Skiing; If We Didn't Have Hair; The Cracked Manual for Good Photography; Programs for Non-Theatrical Events; Self-Praise in Government; The Thrill of Flying Chartered; Cracked's Pollution Solution; M.U.S.H.
ComicInfo.Summary: British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Date on contents page reads "March 1973" which is an error.Stanley invents a new fighting style he calls 'football.'
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:44:19. [Issue ID 250476]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues,John Severin,Murray Ball,Bill Ward,John Langton,Bernard Baily
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,John Severin,Murray Ball,Bill Ward,John Langton,Bernard Baily
